name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Unique identifier for this Contract.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of the resource instance.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of the resource instance.

name: $issued
desc: Returns: When this  Contract was issued.

name: $applies
desc: Returns: Relevant time or time-period when this Contract is applicable.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Relevant time or time-period when this Contract is applicable.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: The target entity impacted by or of interest to parties to the agreement.

name: $addsubject
desc: The target entity impacted by or of interest to parties to the agreement.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The target entity impacted by or of interest to parties to the agreement.

name: $topic
desc: Returns: The matter of concern in the context of this agreement.

name: $addtopic
desc: The matter of concern in the context of this agreement.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The matter of concern in the context of this agreement.

name: $authority
desc: Returns: A formally or informally recognized grouping of people, principals, organizations, or jurisdictions formed for the purpose of achieving some form of collective action such as the promulgation, administration and enforcement of contracts and policies.

name: $addauthority
desc: A formally or informally recognized grouping of people, principals, organizations, or jurisdictions formed for the purpose of achieving some form of collective action such as the promulgation, administration and enforcement of contracts and policies.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A formally or informally recognized grouping of people, principals, organizations, or jurisdictions formed for the purpose of achieving some form of collective action such as the promulgation, administration and enforcement of contracts and policies.

name: $domain
desc: Returns: Recognized governance framework or system operating with a circumscribed scope in accordance with specified principles, policies, processes or procedures for managing rights, actions, or behaviors of parties or principals relative to resources.

name: $adddomain
desc: Recognized governance framework or system operating with a circumscribed scope in accordance with specified principles, policies, processes or procedures for managing rights, actions, or behaviors of parties or principals relative to resources.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Recognized governance framework or system operating with a circumscribed scope in accordance with specified principles, policies, processes or procedures for managing rights, actions, or behaviors of parties or principals relative to resources.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: Type of Contract such as an insurance policy, real estate contract, a will, power of attorny, Privacy or Security policy , trust framework agreement, etc.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Type of Contract such as an insurance policy, real estate contract, a will, power of attorny, Privacy or Security policy , trust framework agreement, etc.

name: $subType
desc: Returns: More specific type or specialization of an overarching or more general contract such as auto insurance, home owner  insurance, prenupial agreement, Advanced-Directive, or privacy consent.

name: $addsubType
desc: More specific type or specialization of an overarching or more general contract such as auto insurance, home owner  insurance, prenupial agreement, Advanced-Directive, or privacy consent.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: More specific type or specialization of an overarching or more general contract such as auto insurance, home owner  insurance, prenupial agreement, Advanced-Directive, or privacy consent.

name: $action
desc: Returns: Action stipulated by this Contract.

name: $addaction
desc: Action stipulated by this Contract.

name: $actionReason
desc: Returns: Reason for action stipulated by this Contract.

name: $addactionReason
desc: Reason for action stipulated by this Contract.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Reason for action stipulated by this Contract.

name: $decisionType
desc: Returns: The type of decision made by a grantor with respect to an offer made by a grantee.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The type of decision made by a grantor with respect to an offer made by a grantee.

name: $contentDerivative
desc: Returns: The minimal content derived from the basal information source at a specific stage in its lifecycle.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The minimal content derived from the basal information source at a specific stage in its lifecycle.

name: $securityLabel
desc: Returns: A set of security labels that define which resources are controlled by this consent. If more than one label is specified, all resources must have all the specified labels.

name: $addsecurityLabel
desc: A set of security labels that define which resources are controlled by this consent. If more than one label is specified, all resources must have all the specified labels.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A set of security labels that define which resources are controlled by this consent. If more than one label is specified, all resources must have all the specified labels.

name: $agent
desc: Returns: An actor taking a role in an activity for which it can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place.

name: $addagent
desc: An actor taking a role in an activity for which it can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An actor taking a role in an activity for which it can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place.

name: $signer
desc: Returns: Parties with legal standing in the Contract, including the principal parties, the grantor(s) and grantee(s), which are any person or organization bound by the contract, and any ancillary parties, which facilitate the execution of the contract such as a notary or witness.

name: $addsigner
desc: Parties with legal standing in the Contract, including the principal parties, the grantor(s) and grantee(s), which are any person or organization bound by the contract, and any ancillary parties, which facilitate the execution of the contract such as a notary or witness.

name: $valuedItem
desc: Returns: Contract Valued Item List.

name: $addvaluedItem
desc: Contract Valued Item List.

name: $term
desc: Returns: One or more Contract Provisions, which may be related and conveyed as a group, and may contain nested groups.

name: $addterm
desc: One or more Contract Provisions, which may be related and conveyed as a group, and may contain nested groups.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: One or more Contract Provisions, which may be related and conveyed as a group, and may contain nested groups.

name: $friendly
desc: Returns: The "patient friendly language" versionof the Contract in whole or in parts. "Patient friendly language" means the representation of the Contract and Contract Provisions in a manner that is readily accessible and understandable by a layperson in accordance with best practices for communication styles that ensure that those agreeing to or signing the Contract understand the roles, actions, obligations, responsibilities, and implication of the agreement.

name: $addfriendly
desc: The "patient friendly language" versionof the Contract in whole or in parts. "Patient friendly language" means the representation of the Contract and Contract Provisions in a manner that is readily accessible and understandable by a layperson in accordance with best practices for communication styles that ensure that those agreeing to or signing the Contract understand the roles, actions, obligations, responsibilities, and implication of the agreement.

name: $legal
desc: Returns: List of Legal expressions or representations of this Contract.

desc: List of Legal expressions or representations of this Contract.
